column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////For the most part
column2: this location is filled with people who live in the River North and/or the Loop surrounding areas
column3: so you have your local Chicago peeps
column4: coupled with a few tourists. Yes
column5: people come from all over the city
column6: but I like that this place has more "locals" than tourists. I also like the diversity of the crowd here and the cool vibe that the restaurant offers. This isn't NYC pizza
column7: so don't expect that kind of pizza here. Hey
column8: this is Chicago where we invented deep-dish pizza that you eat with a fork and knife!
